title: TextUtil
description: TextUtils is a React website to manipulate text such as converting to uppercase and lowercase, removing extra spaces and copy to clipboard. This website has color themes and dark mode.

title: E-commerce Website
description: An ecommerce website is an online store where customers can find products, browse offerings, and place purchases online. It facilitates the transaction between a buyer and seller.

title: Recipees
description: This is a project made to learn the latest languages by building an Website. Collection of recipes, instructions, and information about the preparation and serving of foods..
